column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Mudslide Cookie- I love cookies. I love cookies that look flaky and crispy on the outside
column2: but are chewy and doughy on the inside
column3: like myself. The cookie itself was cooked to perfection and you could mush it out with your tongue
column4: but I think my cocoa defense levels were just too low to handle this. Only get if you're prepared for the chocolate haymaker. I didn't giggle too much. Giggle points 6/10
